Library.description: Service for Change Manager and Schedule Manager Interface.
Library.name: CSI0SoaCmSmInterface

Library.description: Change management and schedule manager interface library
Library.name: csi0cmsmi

Struct.description: CSI Relationship structure represents all required parameters to create the relation between the primary and secondary object.
Struct.name: CsiRelationship

StructElement.description: The parent change item revision object.
StructElement.name: parentChange

StructElement.description: Name of the relation type to create, required. This could be an empty string, in which case the relation name will be searched in the preference, ParentTypeName_ChildTypeName_default_relation or ParentTypeName_default_relation.
StructElement.name: relationType

StructElement.description: The primary object to create the relation from.
StructElement.name: primaryObject

StructElement.description: The secondary object to create the relation to.
StructElement.name: secondaryObject

OperationTemplate.description: Propagate or rollup relations between ChangeItemRevision and Schedule/Task. Propagate will push all change relations from ChangeItemRevision to leaf level tasks in all of the selected schedules/tasks. Rollup will pull all change relations from the selected tasks items to ChangeItemRevision.
OperationTemplate.name: CSI0::Soa::CmSmInterface::RelationManagement::propagateOrRollupRelations
OperationTemplate.returnDescription: The ServiceData containing newly created relations in the created list.

OperationParameter.description: A list of CsiRelationships to be created and propagated or rolled up.
OperationParameter.name: relationships

OperationParameter.description: If true, Rollup is performed; otherwise, Propagate is performed.
OperationParameter.name: rollup

Operation.description: Propagate or rollup relations between ChangeItemRevision and Schedule/Task. Propagate will push all change relations from ChangeItemRevision to leaf level tasks in all of the selected schedules/tasks. Rollup will pull all change relations from the selected tasks items to ChangeItemRevision.
Operation.name: propagateOrRollupRelations
Operation.returnDescription: The ServiceData containing newly created relations in the created list.

ParameterInfo.description: A list of CsiRelationships to be created and propagated or rolled up.
If true, Rollup is performed; otherwise, Propagate is performed.

TcProperty.description: csi0parentChange property is a reference to the ChangeItemRevision object related via the CMHasWorkBreakdown relation to the ScheduleTask's parent Schedule object. csi0parentChange property at the ScheduleTask level provides a convenient reference to the ChangeItemRevision object, that this Schedule object is used as a change plan or execution vehicle, without requiring the lookup via the Schedule object itself. csi0parentChange property is NULL if the ScheduleTask object is part of a Schedule object that is not being used by a ChangeItemRevision object to plan or manage its execution.

Functionality.description: This feature provides the necessary support for Schedule Management and Change Management cooperation and interoperability.
Functionality.name: CSI0csi
